column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Went here on a Saturday night at 7 pm and it was so incredibly crowded that we were barely able to squeeze into the door
column2: into the back to back crowd of people around the bar.  Dinner waiting list was an hour and a half long
column3: so we just had a drink and then left.  It was impossible to even turn around to see who was standing up against your back or leaning on each side of you.
